thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 5 of 447
thread.title: KATHERINE PEREZ

author: KATHERINE PEREZ
title: KATHERINE PEREZ
text: The salesperson that helped us was so helpful and awesome!!! Crystal answered all our questions, and showed us how the cars features work. She was very knowledgeable about the whole process and she was not pushy. She made the whole experience very easy! It's hard and sometimes confusing to make such a big purchase. But if you are looking for a car or truck you need to go to the South West Military location!!!!
